pd:dataInput.pd:label: input
pd:dataInput.pd:description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment. You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 3 columns, and a header row. See [usage docs](https://nf-co.re/quaisar/usage#samplesheet-input).

pd:dataInput.pd:label: kraken2db
pd:dataInput.pd:description: Path (full or relative) for where kraken2 database files are, which includes hash.k2d, taxo.k2d, opts.k2d and ktax_map.k2 files.

pd:dataInput.pd:label: multiqc_config
pd:dataInput.pd:description: Path (full or relative) for where multiqc_config YAML file exists

pd:dataInput.pd:label: project_dir
pd:dataInput.pd:description: directory with additional files/input to run pipeline --- other files in your github project

pd:dataInput.pd:description: additional files/input to run pipeline --- other files in your github project
